title: Brookfield to take over GGP for $15.3 bln
text:
Brookfield to take over GGP for $15.3 bln Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 01:09 
Commercial real estate company Brookfield will buy the 66 percent of GGP that it does not already own in a cash-and-stock deal that values GGP at about $15.3 billion. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
